education_text.0: Vaughan graduated from Wilberforce University in 1929In 1943, Vaughan began a career as a mathematician and programmer at      Langley Research Center Langley Research Center in      Hampton, Virginia Hampton, Virginia, in which she specialized in calculations for      redirect    Flight path flight paths, the   The West Computers made contributions to every area of research at LangleyVaughan is one of the women featured in      Margot Lee Shetterly Margot Lee Shetterly's 2016 fiction book    North Central University North Central University has a scholarship in honor of Dorothy Vaughan for      Person of color BIPOC and
